name: com.dteruel.toolnity.runtimescripts
description:
Collection of scripts for runtime:
- AnyButtonEvent
- DontDestroy
- Event Sequencer
- FrameRateCounter
- FrameRateDisplay
- InputEventLauncher
- OnSceneChangeEvent
- QuitGame
- SceneLoader
-SingletonMonoBehaviour

samples.description: Contains sample of the current package
